metadata.title: RHSA-2023:2177: grafana-pcp security and enhancement update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The Grafana plugin for Performance Co-Pilot includes datasources for scalable time series from pmseries and Redis, live PCP metrics and bpftrace scripts from pmdabpftrace, as well as several dashboards.

Security Fix(es):

* golang: net/http: handle server errors after sending GOAWAY (CVE-2022-27664)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.2 Release Notes linked from the References section.

bugzilla.text: golang: net/http: handle server errors after sending GOAWAY

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
grafana-pcp is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
